scripts.unit_test: npx tsc && npx esbuild test/_unittests.ts --log-level=silent --bundle --platform=node --sourcemap=inline --outfile=dist/tests.js && node --enable-source-maps dist/tests.js
scripts.integration_test: npx tsc && npx esbuild test/_integrationtests.ts --log-level=silent --bundle --platform=node --sourcemap=inline --outfile=dist/tests.js && node --enable-source-maps dist/tests.js
scripts.test: npx tsc && npx esbuild test/_alltests.ts --log-level=silent --bundle --platform=node --sourcemap=inline --outfile=dist/tests.js && node --enable-source-maps dist/tests.js
scripts.test_interpreted: npx tsc && npx esbuild test/_alltests.ts --log-level=silent --bundle --platform=node --sourcemap=inline --outfile=dist/tests.js && node --enable-source-maps dist/tests.js --interpreted
scripts.benchmark: npx esbuild src/headless.ts --log-level=silent --bundle --platform=node --sourcemap=inline --outfile=dist/headless.js && node --enable-source-maps dist/headless.js data/benchmark/benchmark.prx
scripts.benchmark_interpreted: npx esbuild src/headless.ts --log-level=silent --bundle --platform=node --sourcemap=inline --outfile=dist/headless.js && node --enable-source-maps dist/headless.js --interpreted data/benchmark/benchmark.prx
